feed.title: Fort Good Hope - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Fort Good Hope
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:02 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -20.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Good Hope Airport 07:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -20.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -22.4°C
Wind: W 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
